types.name: Root
types.description: Root type represents the base entity of Hacker News API. It provides access to various collections and endpoints such as item and user collections, status checks, and test entities.

fields.name: items
fields.description: Collection of Hacker News items

fields.name: users
fields.description: Collection of Hacker News users

fields.name: status
fields.description: Indicates the current operational status of the Hacker News API service.

fields.name: parse
fields.description: Internal mechanism used for transforming and interpreting item data.

fields.name: stories
fields.description: Collection of top, new, and best stories from Hacker News

fields.name: tests
fields.description: Contains test entities for evaluating and ensuring the reliability of the Hacker News API endpoints.

types.name: ItemCollection

fields.name: one
fields.description: Retrieves a single Hacker News item by ID

fields.name: page
fields.description: Paginated collection of Hacker News items

types.description: ItemCollection type is a container for Hacker News items such as posts, comments, and jobs, allowing retrieval of individual items or paginated lists.

types.name: ItemPage

fields.name: items
fields.description: List of Hacker News items on the current page

fields.name: next
fields.description: Reference to the next page in the collection of Hacker News items

types.description: ItemPage type represents a page of Hacker News items, with references to individual items and the next page of items.

types.name: UserCollection

fields.name: one
fields.description: Retrieves a single Hacker News user profile by username

types.description: UserCollection type provides functionalities to access individual user profiles within Hacker News by their unique identifiers or to create new user profiles.

types.name: Item

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier of a Hacker News item

fields.name: deleted
fields.description: Status indicating if the Hacker News item is deleted

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the Hacker News item (post, comment, job, etc.)

fields.name: by
fields.description: Username of the submitter of the Hacker News item

fields.name: time
fields.description: Timestamp when the Hacker News item was submitted

fields.name: text
fields.description: Text content of the Hacker News item

fields.name: dead
fields.description: Indicates if the Hacker News item is no longer active

fields.name: parent
fields.description: Parent item of this Hacker News item (for comments/replies)

fields.name: kids
fields.description: List of child items linked to this Hacker News item

fields.name: url
fields.description: Original source URL for the Hacker News item

fields.name: score
fields.description: Net score of the Hacker News item

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title of the Hacker News item (stories, jobs)

fields.name: descendants
fields.description: Count of all sub-items (comments, replies) associated with the Hacker News item

types.description: Item type encapsulates a Hacker News item which can be a post, comment, or a job listing. It includes details like identification, ownership, score, and associated comments or children.

types.name: User

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique username of the Hacker News user

fields.name: about
fields.description: Brief bio or description provided by the user

fields.name: created
fields.description: Timestamp of the Hacker News user's account creation

fields.name: karma
fields.description: Score representing the user's contributions to Hacker News

fields.name: submitted
fields.description: Paginated list of the user's submitted items on Hacker News

types.description: User type represents a Hacker News user profile containing personal and activity information such as identity, karma points, and content submissions.

types.name: UserItemPage

fields.name: items
fields.description: List of items submitted by the user on the current page.

fields.name: next
fields.description: Reference to the next page of items submitted by the user.

types.description: UserItemPage type provides a paginated view of items submitted by a Hacker News user, including navigation to subsequent pages.

types.name: UserItemCollection

fields.name: page
fields.description: Enables retrieval of a paginated collection of a user's submitted items.

fields.name: one
fields.description: Allows for fetching a single item from a user's collection by its identifier.

types.description: UserItemCollection type is designed to manage collections of items associated with a specific Hacker News user, such as posted stories or comments.

types.name: Tests

actions.name: testGetStories
actions.description: Tests the ability to retrieve stories from Hacker News.

actions.name: testGetItems
actions.description: Tests the retrieval of individual items from Hacker News.

types.description: Tests type provides actions for testing the functionality of the Hacker News API endpoints, such as retrieving stories or items.
